title: Serum Raman spectroscopy: Unearthing the snapshot of distinct metabolic profile in patients with congenital heart defects (CHDs)

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Radha Joshi, Debosmita Goswami, Panchali Saha, Arti Hole, Poonam Mandhare, Rishikesh Wadke, Prabhatha Rashmi Murthy, Shyamdeep Borgohain, Murali Krishna C, Sudhir Kapoor
